text: Mangifera foetida (also called horse mango, malmut, limus, bachang and machang) is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is found in wet-land rainforest regions of Indonesia, Malaysia, Myanmar, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam. Mangifera foetida from Bogor, West Java, Indonesia 'Mangifera foetida' in Malaysia The fruit is edible. However, young fruits extrude sap that can cause blisters. Mature fruits have a strong smell. ==References== * Our Tropical Garden.
